StructureDefinition-UKCore-Observation

This Observation resource has been constrained to represent an Observation profile.

Profile Minimum Viable Content

The Minimum Viable Content for this profile has not yet been defined and may be added in a later release.

Formal Views of Profile Content

Description of Profiles, Differentials, and Snapshots.

The official URL for this profile is: https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-Observation

Published on Thu Nov 21 00:00:00 GMT 2019 as draft by NHS Digital.

This profile builds on Observation

Summary

Mandatory: 0 element (6 nested mandatory elements)

Structures

This structure refers to these other structures:

Slices

This structure defines the following Slices:

  • The element Observation.code.coding is sliced based on the value of value:system
  • The element Observation.bodySite.coding is sliced based on the value of value:system
